title: Ubiquitous blood pressure monitoring using EEG and PPG signals.
abstract: The Vita-H1 system represents an innovative way of accurately predicting systolic and diastolic blood pressures using PPG and ECG signals. As a cuff-less system, Vita-H1 allows convenient continuous BP monitoring throughout the day. Based on a test set of 90 people, the mean absolute bias for SBP (|H1 - true|) is 5.4mmHg and for DBP is 4.4mmHg, which complies with the IEEE1708--2014standard (MAD
